results.name: Endless Ruin Chapter I: Toward The Endless Ruin

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Xcode. Targeting Apple Silicon with IL2CPP scripting backend requires macOS Catalina 10.15.4 and Xcode 12.2 or newer.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers. For development: IL2CPP scripting backend requires Visual Studio 2015 with C++ Tools component or later and Windows 10 SDK.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 3.2GHz x64-compatible
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 Ti or ATI Radeon™ RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris plus
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ****PLEASE READ: As a solo indie developer, the specifications above are the specs of the hardware used to develop this game. This game MAY run on systems lower than what is specified above.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 3 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT, AMD Radeon HD 2900 XT or Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PC integrated graphics chipsets require 64 bit Windows, e.g. Intel HD series.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2nd Generation Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PC integrated graphics chipsets require 64 bit Windows, e.g. Intel HD series.
